org.sakaiproject.event.api

Interface NotificationAction

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Rule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseRule, DropboxNotification, EmailNotification, ResourceReleaseRule, SearchNotificationAction, SearchReloadNotificationAction, SiteAliasCleanupNotificationAction, SiteEmailNotification, SiteEmailNotificationAnnc, SiteEmailNotificationContent, SiteEmailNotificationMail, SiteEmailNotificationRWiki, SiteEmailNotificationSyllabus

    public interface NotificationAction

    NotificationAction is the helper class that does the notify() for a notification.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NotificationAction getClone()
      Make a new one like me.
      void notify(Notification notification, Event event)
      Do the notification.
      void set(Element el)
      Set from an xml element.
      void set(NotificationAction other)
      Set from another.
      void toXml(Element el)
      Fill this xml element with the attributes.

    • Method Detail

      • set

        void set(Element el)
        Set from an xml element.
        Parameters:
        el - The xml element.

      • set

        void set(NotificationAction other)
        Set from another.
        Parameters:
        other - The other to copy.

      • getClone

        NotificationAction getClone()
        Make a new one like me.
        Returns:
        A new action just like me.

      • toXml

        void toXml(Element el)
        Fill this xml element with the attributes.
        Parameters:
        el - The xml element.

      • notify

        void notify(Notification notification,
          Event event)
        Do the notification.
        Parameters:
        notification - The notification responding to the event.
        event - The event that matched criteria to cause the notification.
